subject: Halls of Fame
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets honored four contributors to their 1986 championship team: Frank Cashen, Davey Johnson, Dwight Gooden and Darryl Strawberry.
snippet: The Mets honored four contributors to their 1986 championship team: Frank Cashen, Davey Johnson, Dwight Gooden and Darryl Strawberry.
